title: Output Schema for createTable Operation
description: Output schema for the createTable operation in the connector.

payload.description: The main response payload from the createTable operation.

TableDescription.description: Represents the properties of a table.

AttributeDefinitions.description: An array of AttributeDefinition objects that describe the key schema for the table and indexes.

AttributeType.description: The data type for the attribute, where: S - the attribute is of type String, N - the attribute is of type Number, B - the attribute is of type Binary.

CreationDateTime.description: The date and time when the table was created, in UNIX epoch time format.

DeletionProtectionEnabled.description: Indicates whether deletion protection is enabled (true) or disabled (false) on the table.

ItemCount.description: The number of items in the specified table.

KeySchema.description: The primary key structure for the table.

AttributeName.description: The name of a key attribute.

KeyType.description: The role that this key attribute will assume: HASH - partition key, RANGE - sort key.

LocalSecondaryIndexes.description: Represents one or more local secondary indexes on the table.

IndexArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies the index.

IndexName.description: Represents the name of the local secondary index.

IndexSizeBytes.description: The total size of the specified index, in bytes.

ItemCount.description: The number of items in the specified index.

KeySchema.description: The complete key schema for the local secondary index.

AttributeName.description: The name of a key attribute.

KeyType.description: The role that this key attribute will assume: HASH - partition key, RANGE - sort key.

Projection.description: Represents attributes that are copied (projected) from the table into the local secondary index.

ProjectionType.description: The set of attributes that are projected into the index: ALL - All of the table attributes are projected, KEYS_ONLY - Only the index and primary keys are projected, INCLUDE - Only the specified table attributes are projected.

NonKeyAttributes.description: Represents the non-key attribute names which will be projected into the index.

GlobalSecondaryIndexes.description: The global secondary indexes, if any, on the table.

ProvisionedThroughput.description: The provisioned throughput settings for the table.

NumberOfDecreasesToday.description: The number of provisioned throughput decreases for this table during this UTC calendar day.

ReadCapacityUnits.description: The maximum number of strongly consistent reads consumed per second before DynamoDB returns a ThrottlingException.

WriteCapacityUnits.description: The maximum number of writes consumed per second before DynamoDB returns a ThrottlingException.

TableArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies the table.

TableId.description: Unique identifier for the table for which the backup was created.

TableSizeBytes.description: The total size of the specified table, in bytes.

TableStatus.description: The current state of the table: CREATING - The table is being created, UPDATING - The table is being updated, DELETING - The table is being deleted, ACTIVE - The table is ready for use, INACCESSIBLE_ENCRYPTION_CREDENTIALS - The AWS KMS key used to encrypt the table is not accessible, ARCHIVING - The table is being archived, ARCHIVED - The table has been archived.

BillingModeSummary.description: Contains the details for the read/write capacity mode.

BillingMode.description: Controls how you are charged for read and write throughput and how you manage capacity.

LastUpdateToPayPerRequestDateTime.description: Represents the time when PAY_PER_REQUEST was last set as the read/write capacity mode.

SSEDescription.description: The description of the server-side encryption status on the specified table.

StreamSpecification.description: The current DynamoDB Streams configuration for the table.

headers.description: Transport headers returned by the createTable operation.

statusCode.description: HTTP status code of the API response.
